page.title: 02BEER BEACH.
page.content: On Beer beach there are lots of fun things to do.You can go on the fish- ing boats and see if you can catch anything.You can go on the rocks which are on either side of the beach and catch some crabs and pick some winkles .Beer beach is curved and has a good strong cliff surrounding it.The cliff is made of chalk and has many small caves in it.In the cliff there are flints that slope to the west.It is a pebble beach but it turns to sand near the rocks and the sea gets warmer.You can swim in the sea or just sunbathe on the pebbles.Beer beach faces south with Beer Head to the west.If you do come there will always be a warm welcome waiting for you.
